gov.loc.repository.bagit.transfer

Class ThresholdFailStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.loc.repository.bagit.transfer.ThresholdFailStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FetchFailStrategy

    public class ThresholdFailStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements FetchFailStrategy
    A FetchFailStrategy that fails in different ways for different thresholds.

    This strategy has two different thresholds:

    • total failures
    • failures per-file

    If a particular file (uniquely identified by the URI) fails, the strategy will return RETRY_CURRENT until the number of failures for that file exceeds the per-file threshold. After meeting or exceeding that threshold, the strategy will return CONTINUE_WITH_NEXT.

    If at any time the total number of failures (across all files) meets or exceeds the total failures threshold, the strategy will return STOP.

    For both thresholds, a threshold of 0 will be exceeded immediately.

    Note

    For implementation simplicity, the maximum permitted thresholds are MAX_INT - 1.

    Version:
    $Id$
    See Also:
    FetchFailureAction, getFileFailureThreshold(), setFileFailureThreshold(int), getTotalFailureThreshold(), setTotalFailureThreshold(int)
